bo-cisco-980.name: Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980
bo-cisco-980.description: The new over-ear wireless headset that's designed for life and perfected for business.

carouselItems.alt: A side view of the Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset. The Bang & Olufsen and Cisco logos are visible on the outside of the ear cup.
The Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset. The Bang & Olufsen and Cisco logos are visible on the outside of the ear cup.
A side view of the Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset. The Bang & Olufsen and Cisco logos are visible on the outside of the ear cup.
A front view of the Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset.

features.longPhrase: Surround yourself in sound while in meetings or listening to music.
Wireless, portable design with up to 24-hours of battery life.
Breathable fiber and an off-center pressure point eliminates irritation.
Eliminate distractions with active noise cancellation and background noise removal.

specs.text: High end audio experience with advanced codecs
On-ear buttons for easy call, music, and noise cancellation controls
Companion mobile app for a customized, signature experience

cisco-headset-730.name: Cisco Headset 730
cisco-headset-730.description: The award-winning, on-ear wireless headset with advanced noise cancellation that’s designed for work and play.

carouselItems.alt: A side view of a Cisco Headset 730 in platinum.
A view of the left side of a Cisco Headset 730 in platinum, showing on-ear button controls.
The Cisco Headset 730 in platinum, shown in its charging stand
A front view of a Cisco Headset 730 in platinum.

cisco-headset-730.tagline: Go anywhere and leave distractions behind.

features.longPhrase: Portable and wireless with a boomless design so you can take it with you wherever you go.
Up to 20 hours of talk time so you can take your meetings with you wherever you go.
Switch between meetings and calls to your favorite focus-work playlist and simultaneously pair with up to two devices.
Active noise cancellation with background noise reduction helps keep your calls crystal clear in any environment.

specs.text: Connectivity: Bluetooth® 5.0, USB-A, and 3.5 mm (audio only)
Voice activated AI: Access Google Assistant or Siri
On-ear buttons for easy call and music controls
Companion mobile app for configuration and customization

meraki-z3c.name: Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway
meraki-z3c.description: Provide security, convenience, and optimized access to your home office.

carouselItems.alt: The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.

features.longPhrase: Always-on VPN. An office-like experience at home with Wi-Fi that’s always connected.
VOIP telephony. Plug-and-play office telephony in a home office from PoE-enabled ports.
Network visibility. Insight into how apps are performing for remote workers with powerful end-to-end analytics.

specs.text: WAN Interfaces: 1 x GbE RJ45; 1 x USB (cellular failover)

mr46.name: MR46
mr46.description: Performance and efficiency for indoor environments with a dedicated security radio.

features.longPhrase: RF Optimization. Dual-concurrent radios with MU-MIMO support.
Layer 7 traffic shaping. Prioritize productivity apps.
Cloud management. Network-wide visibility and control.
Enterprise security. Intrusion detection and prevention system (WIDS/WIPS).

specs.text: Four radios: 2.4 GHz, 5 Ghz, dual-band embedded WIDS/WIPS, and Bluetooth® Low Energy

mr56.name: MR56 AP
mr56.description: Wi-Fi 6 with multigigabit ethernet. Ultra-high performance and efficiency for dense indoor environments with a dedicated security radio.

carouselItems.alt: The MR56 in white. The Cisco logo is visible in the lower right corner.

features.longPhrase: Alert and manage digital operations in real time.
Make workplaces work better.
Transform venues into intelligent spaces.

specs.text: Four radios: 2.4 GHz, 5 Ghz, dual-band embedded WIDS/WIPS, and Bluetooth® Low Energy

ms120-8-fp.name: MS120-8 FP
ms120-8-fp.description: Support a rich networking service in your home, with an access switch that helps you prioritize the traffic coming from data, voice, and video.

features.longPhrase: Layer 2 access switching ideal for small branch deployments.
Easy management and configuration through an intuitive cloud interface.
Granular network visibility and detailed event logs to help you keep track of every configuration change in your network.

specs.text: STP enhancements; voice and video QoS

mx67c.name: MX67C for SD-WAN
mx67c.description: A building block for SASE in a sleek desktop form factor with integrated LTE.

features.longPhrase: Unified threat management. Next-generation layer 7 firewall and content filtering.
Connectivity. Extension of SD-WAN fabric to hybrid clouds and Cisco Umbrella.
Advanced analytics with machine-learning. At-a-glance performance of apps across the LAN, WAN, and app server.

specs.text: WAN: 2 GbE (one WAN/LAN use); one Cat 6 modem; one USB (cellular failover)
LAN: 4 GbE (one for WAN or LAN use)

webex-board-pro-55.name: Webex Board Pro 55
webex-board-pro-55.description: The next-generation device for collaboration, content sharing, and whiteboarding in huddle spaces and small rooms.

carouselItems.alt: The Webex Board Pro 55. The screen shows the time of 9:54; the date August 9; and nine apps including Call, Whiteboard, Calendar, Webex, and Miro.

features.longPhrase: Experience the best of both worlds with high-quality video conferencing and powerful ideation tools.
Bring local and hybrid teams together to co-create with digital whiteboarding and content annotation.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings and access your favorite applications with the touch of a button.
Equip your rooms with AI-powered features including voice-enabled room controls and automated room capacity and cleaning alerts.

specs.text: Camera: Dual 4k, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: Wide-lense camera offers 120° horizontal field of view while the main camera supports 85° horizontal field of view
Audio: 12-element beamforming microphone array and option for microphone extension
Speakers: Multi-channel loudspeaker system with high-quality full-range driver and separate force-cancelling woofers

webex-board-pro-75.name: Webex Board Pro 75
webex-board-pro-75.description: The next-generation device for collaboration, content sharing, and whiteboarding in the ideation space.

carouselItems.alt: Animation of the Webex Board Pro 75, displaying the front and sides. The main screen shows six apps and the time of 9:54.
The front of the Webex Board Pro 75.
The back of the Webex Board Pro 75.
Three-quarters view of the Webex Board Pro 75.

features.longPhrase: Bring local and hybrid teams together to co-create with digital whiteboarding and content annotation.
Ideate before, during, and after the meeting with whiteboards that capture and save every idea so you can easily pick up where you left off.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings and access your favorite applications with the touch of a button.
Equip your spaces with AI-powered features, intelligent sensors, and voice-enabled room controls.

specs.text: Camera: Dual 4k, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: Wide-lense camera offers 120° horizontal field of view while the main camera supports 85° horizontal field of view
Audio: 12-element beamforming microphone array and option for microphone extension
Speakers: Multi-channel loudspeaker system with high-quality full-range driver and separate force-cancelling woofers

webex-desk.name: Webex Desk
webex-desk.description: The all-in-one collaboration device for every desk.

features.longPhrase: Do it all with a dedicated collaboration device that doubles as a high-quality monitor.
Pair your laptop to view and join upcoming meetings, share your screen, or focus on your work.
Interactive whiteboarding lets you brainstorm or ideate on the touch display, while virtual participants can contribute on any device.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with just the touch of a button.

specs.text: Camera: 8MP image sensors, supports up to 30 fps
Field of view: 64° horizontal field of view, 50° vertical field of view
Speaker: Premium full-range center speaker with passive bass radiators

webex-desk-camera.name: Webex Desk Camera
webex-desk-camera.description: The webcam that powers video conferencing at the hot desk.

carouselItems.alt: Three-quarters view of the Webex Desk Camera.
Front view of the Webex Desk Camera.

features.longPhrase: Replace the low-angle, low-quality laptop view with a high-quality webcam.
Excellent video quality in all lighting conditions so you look great even when working late.
Background noise reduction so you can be clearly heard when the office is at its busiest.
Built-in privacy shutter so you always know when you're on and off camera.

specs.text: Screen: Attaches to a laptop or monitor with USB C-to-A and USB C-to-C  cables
Resolution: Supports up to 1080p live video resolution
Camera: 4k Ultra HD, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: 81° diagonal field of view

carouselItems.alt: The Webex Desk Hub shows a bright homescreen with five apps visible and a headset docked on the charging station.
Three-quarters back view of the Webex Desk Hub showing all its ports.
Back view of the Webex Desk Hub showing all its ports.
The Webex Desk Hub shows a bright homescreen with five apps visible and a headset docked on the charging station.

features.longPhrase: Walk up to any open space in the office and authenticate in seconds with wireless pairing.
Reserve your space for a specific time or the entire day.
See your full calendar and contact directory, join meetings, make calls, and charge your devices from one device.
Pair with the Webex Desk Camera for a full video conferencing solution at the hot desk.

specs.text: Camera: Pair with the Webex Desk Camera for a full video conferencing solution

webex-desk-mini.name: Webex Desk Mini
webex-desk-mini.description: The portable video conferencing device that's designed for taking meetings with you to any room—even your kitchen.

features.longPhrase: Designed for portability, you can take it with you to any room in the house, including the kitchen, bedroom, or any small workspace.
Always appear professional with virtual backgrounds and noise removal.
Interactive whiteboarding lets you brainstorm or ideate on the touch display, while virtual participants can contribute from any device.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with the touch of a button.

specs.text: Camera: 8MP image sensors, supports up to 30fps
Field of view: 64° horizontal field of view, 50° vertical field of view
Speakers: Single-channel loudspeaker system with a high quality 18mm tweeter and dual force-cancelling 80mm woofers

webex-desk-pro.name: Webex Desk Pro
webex-desk-pro.description: The most advanced collaboration workstation for the personal office.

carouselItems.alt: The front of the Webex Desk Pro. The screen shows the time of 9:54 and the date August 9, plus icons to call, whiteboard, share, and join a Webex meeting.
The front of the Webex Desk Pro. The screen shows the time of 9:54 and the date August 9, plus icons to call, whiteboard, share, and join a Webex meeting.
The back of the Webex Desk Pro.

features.longPhrase: Do it all with a dedicated collaboration device that doubles as a high-quality monitor.
Always appear professional with virtual backgrounds and noise removal.
Interactive whiteboarding lets you brainstorm or ideate on the touch display, while virtual participants can contribute on any device.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with the touch of a button.

specs.text: Field of view: 71° horizontal field of view, 59° vertical field of view
Speakers: 3 directional speakers and a subwoofer

webex-room-kit-mini.name: Webex Room Kit Mini
webex-room-kit-mini.description: The intelligent video collaboration bar that attaches to any 4K display in your home.

features.longPhrase: Combines codec, camera, microphones, and speakers into a single device that integrates with a 4K display.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with just the touch of a button.
Intelligent views allows you to move around your home office while in a meeting and AI-noise removal keeps unwanted sounds out of your meeting.
Control your meeting experience from a distance with the Webex Room Navigator or use Webex Assistant for a zero-touch experience.

specs.text: Screen: Attaches to 4k displays via HDMI
Resolution: Supports up to 1080p live video resolution
Camera: 4k Ultra HD, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: 120° horizontal field of view
Speakers: Full range speaker and two woofers

webex-room-navigator.name: Webex Room Navigator
webex-room-navigator.description: The intuitive touch panel equipped with built-in sensors and powerful APIs.
webex-room-navigator.tagline: Control every aspect of your meeting

features.longPhrase: Touchscreen or hands-free control of room reservation, temperature, lighting, and the meeting itself.
View and access upcoming meetings, contact lists, and directories.
Stay informed on room humidity, air quality, temperature, and noise level with intelligent sensors that help maintain a safe workspace.
Display custom content, such as stock price and industry news, on the display when in standby mode.
